Class
Description
AddCustomerPanel
A panel for adding a new customer using a GUI form.
AddInvoicePanel
A GUI panel that allows the user to create and insert a new invoice.
AddProductPanel
GUI panel to allow users to add a new product.
AmendViewCustomerPanel
GUI panel that lets the user view and edit customer information from a table.
AmendViewInvoicePanel
GUI panel to view and modify invoice data: - Select an invoice - View, update, delete, or add invoice items
AmendViewProductPanel
A panel that lets users view, filter, and update existing products.
CategoryFilterPanel
A small panel with a dropdown and a button to filter products by category.
Customer
This class represents a customer in the system.
CustomerDAO
Customer DAO ( Data Access Object ): > handles database operations for Customer objects.
CustomerPanel
This class is a custom JPanel for handling customer input.
DeleteCustomer
This class allows the user to delete a customer using the command line by interacting with the CustomerDAO class.
DeleteCustomerPanel
A panel for deleting customers through a GUI table.
DeleteInvoicePanel
A panel for deleting invoices using a GUI.
DeleteProduct
This class handles deleting a product from the database using CLI input.
DeleteProductPanel
A panel that lets the user delete a product from the system.
EditCustomer
This class lets the user edit an existing customer's details through the command line.
EditProduct
Class that allows the user to update an existing product's details through the command line.
HomePage
This class stores information about my project and myself.
InsertCustomer
This class lets the user add a new customer using the command line.
InsertProduct
 
Invoice
Represents an invoice that includes customer info, a list of items, the invoice date, and total amount.
InvoiceDAO
 
InvoiceItem
Represents a single item in an invoice.
InvoicePanel
A custom panel used to create an invoice.
MainFrame
Main window for the ShopManager Pro application.
MyConnection
This class handles connecting to the MySQL database.
Product
Represents a product with basic details such as ID, name, category, price, and stock.
ProductDAO
ProductDAO handles all database operations related to the Product table.
ProductPanel
GUI panel for inputting and displaying product data.
RUN_CODE_HERE
This is the main class that starts the GUI application.

Class responsible for displaying all customers from the database.

ViewProductTable
